post.body: sounds good - I'll wait to hear from you
I am a certified Emotional Intelligence coach - in answer to you question...
great post! Something I needed a reminder of!
love your website and can't wait to read your book!
Hello to you too! I think we may be a rare breed!
just finished reading your Twitter tutorial - very nice!
washing dishes, washing clothes, cleaning the bathroom - focusing on the moment.
All planets going direct this month; full moon today; get ready to wind down the year and start again!
Good Morning, all! Enjoying the cold weather in Houston today! Everyone smile!!!
calling it a night...sweet dreams everyone!
just bought a Mac Book Pro - I'm soooo excited!
some of us are timid. We think we have something to lose so we don't try for the next hill. - maya angelou
watching Peanuts Christmas - a classic!
thinking of ezine articles...want to get a head start on '09!
Everyone ready to start the week? What's your focus this week? Mine is getting blog started..
just got back from some gallery openings with my daughter - nice bonding time!
watching the HBO series "Rome" - awesome!
"when one is out of touch with oneself, once cannot touch others" -- Anne Morrow Lindbergh
An 8 day and Moon in Pisces - great day for accomplishing and organizing some of your more visionary projects.
having pizza for dinner - diet starts tomorrow! LOL!
"The true value of a human being is determined primarily by how he has attained liberation from the self."" - Albert Einstein
Search others for their virtues, thyself for thy vices - benjamin franklin
baking cookies for a cookie exchange this afternoon
Back from the holidays...trying to get back to "normal". Any suggestions?
Some people are always grumbling that roses have thorns. I am thankful that thorns have roses. - Alphonse Karr
